title: What is the name of the techno or electro song with no lyrics and two robots made out of parts? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s a German band (whom I absolutely love) called Kraftwerk (“Power Plant”) that has a history of setting up the stage for robots. When they began, they would disguise themselves as robots, with thick make-up and “robotic” gestures, but also using dolls to represent them:  This is an updated version of the same video concept (I still prefer the original):  In the early nineties they had a show called “The Mix” in which they didn’t actually show up, but only robots that really “danced mechanically” to a prerecorded tune:  Problem is: You can’t describe Kraftwerk’s music as “music that lift you up” but rather as “music that kills down your mood and convince you that this post-modern world is going to be ever shittier”.  Korrekt?
